page.title: 03Conference and Retreat House
page.content:
{HOLLAND HOUSE
This interesting old building is situated on the main street of Cropthorne and has rear views across the valley of the{Avon.}It was originally three cottages combined to make a farmhouse in 1800. It had a beautiful old fashioned English garden with tennis and croquet lawns. After the 1939 - 1945 War the owner gave the house to the{Diocese of Worcester as a retreat and conference house. Later it was extended and a chapel added. In 1974 it was leased to an Independent Trust and has become a lively{Christian Centre}visited by over 3000 people a year.
